name: attajak.vercel.app
description: This is a quick start template for Hugo theme [FixIt](https://github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt) & [FixIt-Bundle](https://github.com/hugo-fixit/fixit-bundle). It uses Hugo module feature to load the theme.

scripts.prepare: git submodule update --init --recursive && git submodule update --remote --merge
scripts.update:mod: hugo mod get -u github.com/hugo-fixit/FixIt@main && hugo mod get -u github.com/hugo-fixit/fixit-bundle@latest && hugo mod tidy && hugo mod graph
scripts.update:git: git add go.mod go.sum .gitmodules && git commit -m ':arrow_up: Chore(FixIt): Update FixIt components version' && git push origin main

author: attajak (https://github.com/attajak)
